buff_desc_ultbook_zombiedragonsoul_coold:
Ruined Dragon Soul
This unit's Dragon Soul Resurrection is on Cooldown
generatedtip_passive_ultbook_gwenp_descr: Gwen's attacks deal bonus magic damage based on the targets health. She heals for a portion of the damage dealt to champions by this effect.
generatedtip_passive_ultbook_velkozpassi: Vel'Koz's abilities apply <keywordName>Organic Deconstruction</keywordName> to enemies on hit. If 3 stacks are accumulated, the enemy will take a burst of true damage.
generatedtip_passive_ultbook_xayahpassiv: After using an ability, Xayah's next basic attacks will hit all targets along their path and leave a <font color='#C200E1'>Feather</font>.
generatedtip_spell_summoner_ultbookplace: This slot will be replaced by another champion's ultimate selected at the start of the game. There will be 30 seconds to select an ultimate. Be prepared!
generatedtip_spell_summoner_ultbooksmite: This slot will be replaced by another champion's ultimate and you will gain Attack-Smite. There will be 30 seconds to select an ultimate. Be prepared!
generatedtip_spell_ultbook_ahrir_descrip: Ahri dashes forward and fires essence bolts, damaging nearby enemies. Spirit Rush can be cast up to three times before going on cooldown, and gains additional recasts when taking down enemy champions.
generatedtip_spell_ultbook_akalir_descri: Akali leaps in a direction, damaging enemies she strikes. Re-cast: Akali dashes in a direction, executing all enemies she strikes.
generatedtip_spell_ultbook_annier_descri: Annie wills her bear Tibbers to life, dealing damage to units in the area. Tibbers can attack and also burns enemies that stand near him.
generatedtip_spell_ultbook_azirr_descrip: Azir summons a wall of soldiers which charge forward, knocking back and damaging enemies.
generatedtip_spell_ultbook_bardr_descrip: Bard sends spirit energy arcing to a location, putting all champions, minions, monsters, and turrets hit into stasis for a brief time.
generatedtip_spell_ultbook_caitlynr_desc: Caitlyn takes time to line up the perfect shot, dealing massive damage to a single target at a huge range. Enemy champions can intercept the bullet for their ally.
generatedtip_spell_ultbook_camiller_desc: Camille dashes to target champion, anchoring them to the area. She also deals bonus magic damage to the target with her basic attacks.
generatedtip_spell_ultbook_cassiopeiar_d: Cassiopeia releases a swirl of magical energy from her eyes, stunning any enemies in front of her that are facing her and slowing any others with their back turned.
generatedtip_spell_ultbook_dianar_descri:
Diana reveals and draws in all nearby enemies and slows them.

If Diana pulls in one or more enemy champions, the moonlight crashes down onto her after a short delay, dealing magic damage in an area around her, increased for each target beyond the first pulled.
generatedtip_spell_ultbook_drmundor_desc: Dr. Mundo pumps himself with chemicals, instantly healing a percent of his missing Health. He then gains Move Speed and regenerates a portion of his maximum Health over a long duration.
generatedtip_spell_ultbook_ekkor_descrip: Ekko shatters his timeline, becoming untargetable and rewinding to a more favorable point in time. He returns to whenever he was a few seconds ago, and heals for a percentage of the damage received in that duration. Enemies near his arrival zone take massive damage.
generatedtip_spell_ultbook_evelynnr_desc: Evelynn briefly goes untargetable and decimates the area in front of her before warping backwards a long distance.
generatedtip_spell_ultbook_ezrealr_descr: Ezreal winds up before firing a powerful barrage of energy that deals massive damage to each unit it passes through (damage is reduced for minions and non-epic monsters).
generatedtip_spell_ultbook_fiddlesticksr: A murder of crows flock wildly around Fiddlesticks, dealing damage per second to all enemy units in the area.
generatedtip_spell_ultbook_fizzr_descrip: Fizz tosses a fish in a direction that attaches to any champion that touches it, slowing the target. After a short delay, a shark erupts from the ground, knocking up the target and knocking any nearby enemies aside. All enemies hit are dealt magic damage and slowed.
generatedtip_spell_ultbook_gangplankr_de: Gangplank signals his ship to bombard an area, slowing and damaging enemies.
generatedtip_spell_ultbook_garenr_descri: Garen calls upon the might of Demacia to attempt to execute an enemy champion.
generatedtip_spell_ultbook_gnarr_descrip: Mega Gnar throws everything around him in a chosen direction, dealing damage and slowing them.  Any enemy that hits a wall is stunned and takes bonus damage.
generatedtip_spell_ultbook_gragasr_descr: Gragas hurls his cask to a location, dealing damage and knocking back enemies caught in the blast radius.
generatedtip_spell_ultbook_gwenr_descrip:
Gwen hurls a needle that slows enemies hit, deals magic damage, and applies A Thousand Cuts to champions hit.

This ability can be cast up to two more times, with each cast throwing additional needles and dealing more damage.
generatedtip_spell_ultbook_jhinr_descrip: Jhin channels, transforming Whisper into a shoulder-mounted mega-cannon. It is able to fire 4 super shots at extreme range that pierce through minions and monsters, but stop on the first champion impacted. Whisper cripples enemies hit, which slows them and deals execute damage. The 4th shot is perfectly crafted, epically powerful, and guaranteed to critically strike.
generatedtip_spell_ultbook_jinxr_descrip: Jinx fires a super rocket across the map that gains damage as it travels. The rocket will explode upon colliding with an enemy champion, dealing damage to it and surrounding enemies based on their missing Health.
generatedtip_spell_ultbook_kaisar_descri: Kai'Sa dashes near an enemy champion.
generatedtip_spell_ultbook_kayler_descri: Kayle makes an ally invulnerable and calls upon former Aspects of Justice to purify the area around her target with a holy rain of swords.
generatedtip_spell_ultbook_khazixr_descr: Each rank allows Kha'Zix to evolve one of his abilities, giving it a unique additional effect. When activated, Kha'Zix becomes <font color='#91d7ee'>Invisible</font>, triggering Unseen Threat and increasing Move Speed. If he chooses to <font color='#00DD33'>Evolve Adaptive Cloaking</font>, Void Assault gains increased <font color='#91d7ee'>Invisibility</font> duration, and an additional use.
generatedtip_spell_ultbook_kindredr_desc: Lamb grants all living things inside a zone a respite from death. Until the effect ends, nothing can die. At the end, units are healed.
generatedtip_spell_ultbook_lissandrar_de: If cast on an enemy champion, the target is frozen solid, stunning it. If cast on Lissandra, she encases herself in dark ice, healing herself while becoming untargetable and invulnerable. Dark ice then emanates from the target dealing magic damage to enemies and slowing Move Speed.
generatedtip_spell_ultbook_lucianr_descr: Lucian unleashes a torrent of shots from his weapons.
generatedtip_spell_ultbook_lulur_descrip: Lulu enlarges an ally, knocking nearby enemies into the air and granting the ally a large amount of bonus health. For the next few seconds, that ally gains an aura that slows nearby enemies.
generatedtip_spell_ultbook_luxr_descript: After gathering energy, Lux fires a beam of light that deals damage to all targets in the area. In addition, triggers Lux's passive ability and refreshes the Illumination debuff duration.
generatedtip_spell_ultbook_malzaharr_des: Malzahar channels the essence of the Void to suppress an enemy champion over a zone of damaging negative energy.
generatedtip_spell_ultbook_maokair_descr: Maokai summons a colossal wall of brambles and thorns that slowly advances forwards, damaging and rooting any enemies in the path.
generatedtip_spell_ultbook_mordekaiserr_: Mordekaiser drags his victim to a different dimension with him and steals a portion of their stats. If he kills them, he keeps the stats until the victim respawns.
generatedtip_spell_ultbook_morganar_desc: Morgana unleashes the full force of her Celestial power as she unbinds her wings and hovers above the ground. She lashes chains of dark pain onto nearby enemy champions, gaining Move Speed. The chains slow and deal initial damage and, after a delay, stun those who are unable to break them.
generatedtip_spell_ultbook_nasusr_descri: Nasus unleashes a mighty sandstorm that batters nearby enemies. While the storm rages, he gains increased Health, Attack Range, damages nearby enemies, has a reduced cooldown on Siphoning Strike, and gains bonus Armor and Magic Resistance.
generatedtip_spell_ultbook_neekor_descri: After a short preparation, Neeko leaps into the air, knocking up all nearby enemies. Upon landing, nearby enemies are damaged and stunned. The preparation is hidden if Neeko is disguised.
generatedtip_spell_ultbook_nilahr_descri: Twirling her whip-blade in joyful exuberance, Nilah deals damage to enemies around her before pulling them closer with her weapon.
generatedtip_spell_ultbook_nunur_descrip: Nunu & Willump create a powerful blizzard in an area that slows enemies and deals massive damage at the end.
generatedtip_spell_ultbook_poppyr_descri: Poppy channels a hammer strike that knocks enemies very far away.
generatedtip_spell_ultbook_pyker_descrip: Pyke blinks to and executes low health enemies, allowing him to cast this spell again and granting additional gold to an ally who assists.
generatedtip_spell_ultbook_quinnr_descri: Quinn and Valor team up to fly around at great speed.  Ending the ability casts Skystrike, which deals damage to nearby enemies and marks champions as Vulnerable.
generatedtip_spell_ultbook_rakanr_descri: Gains Move Speed, charming and dealing magic damage to enemies touched.
generatedtip_spell_ultbook_rellr_descrip: Rell explodes in a magnetic fury, violently Pulling nearby enemies toward herself. Then Rell constantly Drags nearby enemies toward herself for a short while, dealing magic damage over time.
generatedtip_spell_ultbook_renatar_descr: Renata sends out a wave of chemicals, causing any enemies hit to go Berserk.
generatedtip_spell_ultbook_rengarr_descr: Rengar's predatory instincts take over, <font color='#cd90ee'>Camouflaging</font> him and revealing the nearest enemy champion in a large radius around him. During Thrill of the Hunt, Rengar gains Move Speed and he can leap to the tracked enemy without being in brush, reducing their armor.
generatedtip_spell_ultbook_ryzer_descrip:
Passively, Overload deals even more damage against targets with Flux.

On cast, Ryze creates a portal to a nearby location. After a few seconds, allies standing near the portal are teleported to the target location.
generatedtip_spell_ultbook_sennar_descri: Senna calls upon the relic stones of fallen Sentinels, splitting her relic cannon into a holy array of shadow and light. She then fires a global beam that shields allies from harm, while damaging enemies caught in the center.
generatedtip_spell_ultbook_seraphiner_de: Seraphine deals damage and charms enemies hit, refreshing the range with every allied or enemy champion hit.
generatedtip_spell_ultbook_shenr_descrip: Shen shields target allied champion from incoming damage, and soon after teleports to their location.
generatedtip_spell_ultbook_sorakar_descr: Soraka fills her allies with hope, instantly restoring health to herself and all allied champions.
generatedtip_spell_ultbook_sylasr_descri: Sylas steals the enemy's ultimate ability and can cast it freely.
generatedtip_spell_ultbook_syndraq_descr: Syndra conjures a Dark Sphere dealing magic damage. The sphere remains and can be manipulated by her other powers.
generatedtip_spell_ultbook_syndrar_descr: Syndra bombards an enemy Champion with all of her Dark Spheres.
generatedtip_spell_ultbook_taliyahr_desc: Taliyah creates a very long wall and then surfs it.
generatedtip_spell_ultbook_talonr_descri: Talon disperses a ring of blades and becomes Invisible while gaining additional Move Speed. When Talon emerges from Invisibility, the blades converge on his location. Each time the blades move, Shadow Assault deals physical damage to enemies hit by at least one blade.
generatedtip_spell_ultbook_tristanar_des: Tristana loads a massive cannonball into her weapon and fires it at an enemy unit. This deals Magic Damage and knocks the target back. If the target is carrying the Explosive Charge bomb, the bomb detonation radius is doubled.
generatedtip_spell_ultbook_urgotr_descri: Urgot fires a chem-drill that impales the first enemy champion hit. If that champion falls below a health threshold, Urgot judges them weak and can execute them.
generatedtip_spell_ultbook_varusr_descri: Varus flings out a damaging tendril of corruption that immobilizes the first enemy champion hit and then spreads towards nearby uninfected champions, immobilizing them too on contact.
generatedtip_spell_ultbook_varusw_descri: Passive: Varus' basic attacks deal bonus magic damage and apply Blight. Varus' other abilities detonate Blight, dealing magic damage based on the target's maximum Health. Active: Varus empowers his next Piercing Arrow.
generatedtip_spell_ultbook_velkozr_descr: Vel'Koz unleashes a channelled beam that follows the cursor for 2.5 seconds that deals magic damage. Organic Deconstruction Researches enemy champions causing them to take true damage instead.
generatedtip_spell_ultbook_vexr2_descrip: Fire a missile that marks an enemy champion.  Recast to dash to them and deal damage.
generatedtip_spell_ultbook_vexr_descript: Fire a missile that marks an enemy champion.  Recast to dash to them and deal damage.
generatedtip_spell_ultbook_vir_descripti: Vi runs down an enemy, knocking aside anyone in the way. When she reaches her target she knocks it into the air, jumps after it, and slams it back into the ground.
generatedtip_spell_ultbook_xayahr_descri: Xayah leaps into the air becoming untargetable and throwing out a fan of daggers, dropping Feathers she can recall.
generatedtip_spell_ultbook_yoner_descrip: Yone blinks behind the last champion in a line with a slash so powerful it pulls all enemies hit towards him.
generatedtip_spell_ultbook_zacr_descript: Zac bounces four times, knocking up enemies hit and slowing them.
generatedtip_spell_ultbook_zoer_descript: Blink to a nearby position for 1 second. Then blink back.
generatedtip_spellkayn_ultbook_kaynr_des: Kayn hides in an enemy's body, dealing massive damage when he bursts out.
generatedtip_summonerspell_itemultbookju: Deals true damage to a monster or minion.
spellmodifier_ultbook_kaisarspellmodifie: Plasma is applied by your own Attacks, or by Immobilizing effects from your team.
spellmodifier_ultbookrerollstatboost_des:
Swap Bonus: If you choose this spell, you will gain a permanent stack of the stats below, plus 300 gold.
• @Spell.UltBook_SharedSpellData:RerollStatBoost@ %i:miniAdaptiveForce% Adaptive Force
• @Spell.UltBook_SharedSpellData:DefensiveRerollStatBoost@ %i:miniArmor% Armor
• @Spell.UltBook_SharedSpellData:DefensiveRerollStatBoost@ %i:miniMR% Magic Resistance
spellmodifier_ultbookstatboost_descripti:
While this is your Ulternate Summoner, after the first time this spell is no longer on cooldown, gain:
• @Spell.UltBook_SharedSpellData:StatBoost@ %i:miniAdaptiveForce% Adaptive Force
• @Spell.UltBook_SharedSpellData:StatBoost@ %i:miniArmor% Armor
• @Spell.UltBook_SharedSpellData:StatBoost@ %i:miniMR% Magic Resistance
